page.title: 01GENERAL PICTURE
page.content:
Our area contains no towns or villages, although there are homes within it. It is entirely inside the boundary of the North York Moors National Park and contains Forstry Commission conifer plantations, farmland, rough grazing and heather-clad moorland.
Several long-distance footpaths cross this area and from the highest point the whole of the Teesside Industrial complex as far as Hartlepool bay can be seen on a clear day.
Because there are no villages and few services, and because the roads tend to be impassable when there has been snow, the people who live here usually work here too. Those who commute to Teesside tend to live in villages on lower ground.
